title: (Tiv) Six steps to harvesting more than 20 tons per hectare of cassava with improved weed control

tasks.task: Performing physical tasks related to cassava farming and research.
subtasks: Analyzing soil samples and plant health.
Conducting experiments with different cassava varieties.
Documenting the progress of the cassava fields.
Using agricultural equipment such as tractors and sprayers.
Adapting farming practices to regional conditions.
